ISSUE.TITLE: Allowed to add attribute combination without selecting an attribute
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Add two product attributes ``` * Color with values: Yellow, Blue * Ram with values: 1GB, 2GB ``` ![Screen Shot 2019-06-13 at 13 26 45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6512556/59429137-66986e80-8ddf-11e9-968d-7c53be58e843.png) 2) Add new attribute combination manually and save without selecting a product attribute value. ![Screen Shot 2019-06-13 at 13 36 26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6512556/59429538-4917d480-8de0-11e9-906f-fc4be87085a7.png) 3) You're left with an empty attribute combination ![Screen Shot 2019-06-13 at 13 28 03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6512556/59429567-5b920e00-8de0-11e9-8d12-b616d79a1156.png) I am not sure if you classify this as a bug, but to me a attribute combination without selecting an attribute doesn't seem right!

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3951 Added check whether the attribute value is specified
